document_data.name: Mizzen Mast
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mizzen Mast''' was a business in the [[Skullport/Lower Trade Lanes|Lower Trade Lanes]] of [[Skullport]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Structure: The Mizzen Mast was a three-story building in good condition.
document_data.Description: The Mizzen Mast specialized in the construction of a wide range of watercraft, guided by the motto, “No boat too large or small.” Owned and operated by [[Zulthir Hestern|Zulthir "Spyglass" Hestern]], a seasoned craftsman with decades of experience, the Mizzen Mast constructed everything from simple rafts to grand [[galleon]]s. Known for delivering quality results at reasonable prices, Zulthir's work was particularly favored by smugglers, who valued his expertise in crafting hidden compartments within vessels, ideal for concealing illicit cargo.
